title: Milestone & Fa'asinomaga - Malumalu Orbital
heading: Milestone & Fa'amatalaga
description: O lenei galuega faatufugaga e tele tausaga o se vaega o le 13th Mercosul Bienal i Porto Alegre, Pasila, na saunia e Marcelo Dantas. Ua leva ona lisiina mo le Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Ua manumalo foi i le ArtSat Category o le tauvaga CubeDesign 2021, fa ªalauiloaina e le Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
